statement.name: INSERT_SMAGSU
statement.sql: INSERT INTO smagcu( NROGCU, CODCIA, NROGCR, CODPRS ,NOMGCU, APEGCU ,EMLGCU ,CELGCU ,PSWGCU ,STDGCU ,TPOGCU ,SQLBKR) VALUES ( ?, ?, ?, ? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? )

statement.name: UPDATE_SMAGCU
statement.sql: UPDATE SMAGCU SET NROGCR=? WHERE trim(CODCIA)=? AND trim(CODPRS)=?

statement.name: DELETE_SMAGCU
statement.sql: DELETE SMAGCU WHERE trim(CODCIA)=? AND trim(CODPRS)=? AND NROGCR=1
